title: Australia news live: Chalmers says ABC reporter ‘just doing his job’ in Trump confrontation; NSW unveils big planning reform
summary: I'm unable to follow live updates or access current news feeds. However, if you provide me with the specific news content you'd like summarized, I'd be happy to help!

title: From jobseeker to the pension, Centrelink welfare payments are about to increase – slightly
summary: Starting Saturday, payments will rise due to indexation, with youth allowance increasing to $1,027.70 per fortnight and jobseeker support reaching $793.60 per fortnight.

title: Minneapolis police say more than a dozen hurt in homeless encampment shootings
summary: A police chief expressed sorrow over yet another mass shooting following incidents at two different locations. He highlighted the recurring tragedy and its impact on the community. Authorities are investigating the events to provide answers and support to victims and families.

title: Art review – James Corden is the cheer-worthy standout of Broadway revival
summary: After a late-night appearance, the star impressively returns to the stage in a comedy that explores male friendship. The show is described as moderately entertaining, showcasing the dynamics between the characters. Overall, it's an engaging performance that highlights the star's talents.

title: Charlie Kirk murder suspect told he faces death penalty if convicted in first appearance – as it happened
summary: Tyler Robinson appeared virtually in court facing seven charges, including aggravated murder. His next court date is scheduled for September 29. The case continues to develop as proceedings unfold.
